content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I was commanded to browse a website for information on customs and traditions of different countries by region using Google, but the US Foreign Service Institute did not provide useful information. You then gave me a new command to browse a website at https://www.saudiembassy.net/culture-art for information on customs and traditions of different countries. My computer returned an answer gathered from the website, which provided information about the culture and traditions of Saudi Arabia. The text discussed customs and traditions such as hospitality, coffee preparation, burning incense to welcome guests, the holy month of Ramadan, the Hajj pilgrimage, and the national holidays that follow them. It also mentioned the importance of historic preservation, architecture, calligraphy, cultural institutions, folk music and dancing, poetry, and traditional dress and jewelry in Saudi Arabia. However, the text did not provide information about customs and traditions of different countries beyond Saudi Arabia.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://www.pewresearch.org/global/2017/02/01/wide-disparity-on-the-importance-of-national-customs-and-traditions/", "https://www.amnesty.org/en/what-we-do/indigenous-peoples/", "https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC1414713/", "https://www.worldbank.org/en/topic/indigenouspeoples", "https://www.pbs.org/independentlens/content/two-spirits_map-html/", "https://www.un.org/esa/socdev/unpfii/documents/5session_factsheet1.pdf", "https://www.saudiembassy.net/culture-art", "https://www.un.org/development/desa/indigenouspeoples/mandated-areas1/culture.html"]'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.saudiembassy.net/culture-art", "question": "What are some customs and traditions of different countries?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text provides information about the culture and traditions of Saudi Arabia, including its Islamic heritage, historical role as a trade center, and Bedouin traditions. It discusses customs and traditions such as hospitality, coffee preparation, burning incense to welcome guests, the holy month of Ramadan, the Hajj pilgrimage, and the national holidays that follow them. It also mentions the importance of historic preservation, architecture, calligraphy, cultural institutions, folk music and dancing, poetry, and traditional dress and jewelry in Saudi Arabia. The text does not provide information about customs and traditions of different countries beyond Saudi Arabia. \n \n Links: ['\\nThe Royal Embassy of Saudi Arabia\\n\\n (https://www.saudiembassy.net/)', 'Contact Us (https://www.saudiembassy.net/contact-us)', ' (https://twitter.com/SaudiEmbassyUSA)', ' (https://www.youtube.com/user/saudiembassyusa)', ' (https://www.saudiembassy.net/culture-art)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "customs and traditions of different countries by region"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://www.pewresearch.org/global/2017/02/01/wide-disparity-on-the-importance-of-national-customs-and-traditions/", "https://www.amnesty.org/en/what-we-do/indigenous-peoples/", "https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC1414713/", "https://www.worldbank.org/en/topic/indigenouspeoples", "https://www.pbs.org/independentlens/content/two-spirits_map-html/", "https://www.un.org/esa/socdev/unpfii/documents/5session_factsheet1.pdf", "https://www.saudiembassy.net/culture-art", "https://www.un.org/development/desa/indigenouspeoples/mandated-areas1/culture.html"]'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.un.org/development/desa/indigenouspeoples/mandated-areas1/culture.html", "question": "What are some customs and traditions of different countries by region?"}}}'}]
"""
